pros: Integrated straps for a skateboard or jacket
Padded sections to protect both a laptop and tablet
Large front organizer pocket and 3 smaller pockets for better organization
Sternum strap adds comfort under heavy loads
cons: No water bottle mesh pocket, though some use the board straps for this

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, made to last
customer_reviews.text: Dakine is my go to backpack for quality. My junior high school kid doesnt have lockers and has to carry multiple heavy books. Other backpacks have ripped and otherwise fell apart due to the weight. This backpack is still like new 6 months into the school year. Also there are lots of pockets to store anything you need, there is a cool/insulated area that is large enough to store a small lunch in the front pocket, however things do get smooshed in there if theyre not in hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua gene Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade from the old pre 2015 mission bags
customer_reviews.text: Huge downgrade in quality compared to the older style mission bags. You can see he quality difference in the dakine logo on the snowboard holder straps. Wish i spent the money to fix the zipper on my old mission bag than order a new one. Materials feels really cheap compared to the older cloth, no sunglasses pocket, no lined inside little pockets, top of shoulder straps not bridged together, cheap feeling handle on top of the bag compared to the old handle being the bridged together shoulder straps, smaller waist buckles and padding. Don’t compare it to an older mission bag or you’ll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste tips money
customer_reviews.text: The material used to make this bag is really thin and cheap. I have a Dakine from 10 years ago that's fantastic but this doesn't even compare to the quality of the old bag. The front pocket flops inwardand sags if anything with weight is put in it. The side pockets are tiny and there's nowhere to put a water bottle... Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Either a fake or they’ve gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: Either a fake or they’ve gone downhill. No side sunglasses pocket, the side pockets are smaller, the waist belt padded area is shorter, the fabric feels cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Love Dakine!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. A bit big for me (130lbs, 5’ 8”) but perfect size for my husband (175lbs, 6’). We both got one. I also got the same bag but the 18 gallon which fit me perfectly for a day bag. This one I use for traveling-clothes, laptop, etc. My smaller one can’t fit the laptop, though it can fit the Xbox one x plus controllers perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Just a random citizen

customer_reviews.title: A great find for skaters
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for what I needed -- I carry my medium longboard with the straps and can fit 2 small laptops with accessories in it. I also love the waist straps for wearing it while I skate. I do wish it had a water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Jamis

customer_reviews.title: Dakine makes some excellent products and this is one of them
customer_reviews.text: I carried this bag every day for two weeks while on vacation. Had tons of storage options to keep everything organized. I barely noticed it at all when walking around with it. Held everything I needed for the long plane rides and even allowed me to be a bit creative with the straps on the front and attaching my air plane pillow. Didnt show any signs of wear or distress. Dakine makes some excellent products and this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Super light, comfy, and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for my job and this backpack was suggested to my by a coworker. So far, it has been a life-saver. Has plenty of space, is super comfy to wear for long periods of time, and is light-weight! I wish it had an open pocket for water bottles on the side, but that's just a preference, and otherwise, it's absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: RayCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Not too roomy, but there's a spot for everything I need, and can carry a skateboard. Easy to skate in, travel with and bring to work too.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: Good travel back pack!
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to South Africa with this and it was perfect. Roomy and durable and super comfortable straps! The floral pattern was super cute, too!
customer_reviews.author: catipilargirl

customer_reviews.title: good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack! I had one years ago that I loved and am glad to have found it again. The clasps are a good size to use for a yoga mat or sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Straps broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this backpack for my daughter who just started high school and also snowboards. We were thinking she could use for both. She's only had it for 3 months and 2 straps have already broken, and of course it's past the window to return for a new one. I'm glad it broke while using it for school and not hiking with her board as that could be dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.author: pcd3

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and useful backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and well organized backpack. I don’t board though and the straps on the back look dumb so I cut them off.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kay

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is high quality and fits very well compared to a few other ones which I have had to return upon receipt. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MomDo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Durable and good looking - fit my husband’s PS4 and accessories nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! Great backpack! Has side pockets to put my chargers, room for sunglasses on top, and we'll organized pockets&sleeves inside. I can even fasten my motorcycle helmet on the back straps! myself when riding the bike. All in all great backpack. Much comfortable than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Best pack for the everyday guy. Gym, work, commute, it does it all. Awesome. I use mine daily and it's solid and no letting up on quality.
customer_reviews.author: SUREFIRE PF

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: Back pack was bought for my son who asked for this particular Brand. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Franklin

customer_reviews.title: She liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for her European trip this past summer. She liked it very much. Although she wished the straps were wider Overall, very happy with with the style, color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pack! Have owned 3 different Dakine backpacks, all of them excellent. Durable!
customer_reviews.author: James Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice quality bag! It has many different compartments that all have a certain use! The insulated lunch pocket is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Poor Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Poor craftsmanship. Only a few months after purchasing this product, 1. the chest strap broke (stitching came undone) and 2. one of the zippers for the main compartment broke. I had been using this backpack for electric longboard commuting. It typically only held a light load of laptop and jacket and yet it still couldn't stay intact!
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite backpack of all time. The quality is durable and is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I bought this bag mostly to travel with my skateboard. Fits my carver skateboard great. Love the top and side pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 17-year old and 12-year old have these and love them. The perfect size for school. Only downside there is not a good water bottle pocket. They would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Moss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good backpack works well to carry my stuff to work!
customer_reviews.author: Thekiller578

customer_reviews.title: the other for smaller items like composition book
customer_reviews.text: Simple back pack with two deep pockets one for a laptop and notebooks, the other for smaller items like composition book, food, chargers. Down fall, I wished the waist straps had a pocket to hide. The color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 18 yr old son. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love taking this bag everywhere i go makes things easy to organize
customer_reviews.author: lucas wayne richard

customer_reviews.title: Great use for its price and size
customer_reviews.text: Great use for its price and size. Took it to me around the NYC and Tokyo. Only reason why I wouldn't give it a 5 star is that it is missing a water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! So much room and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Not too functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Not too functional. Can't hold a water bottle.... -_- Not happy but tastes my fault for going off the pic only.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nguyen

product_meta.title: Dakine Mission Backpack 25l
product_meta.description: Padded laptop sleeve, fits most 15 inch laptops, vertical board carry straps, fleece lined padded iPad sleeve, fleece lined sunglass or goggle pocket, ergonomic shoulder straps with breathable air mesh, organizer pocket, dual zippered side pockets, storable waist belt, adjustable sternum strap.
feature_bullets: Fleece lined sunglass or goggle pocket
